title: The Week in Ransomware - November 17th 2023 - Citrix in the Crosshairs
description: Ransomware gangs target exposed Citrix Netscaler devices using a publicly available exploit to breach large organizations, steal data, and encrypt files. [...]

title: Bloomberg Crypto X account snafu leads to Discord phishing attack
description: The official Twitter account for Bloomberg Crypto was used earlier today to redirect users to a deceptive website that stole Discord credentials in a phishing attack. [...]

title: Yamaha Motor confirms ransomware attack on Philippines subsidiary
description: Yamaha Motor's Philippines motorcycle manufacturing subsidiary was hit by a ransomware attack last month, resulting in the theft and leak of some employees' personal information. [...]

title: Google: Hackers exploited Zimbra zero-day in attacks on govt orgs
description: Hackers leveraged a medium-severity security issue now identified as CVE-2023-37580 since June 29, nearly a month before the vendor addressed it in version 8.8.15 Patch 41of the software on July 25. [...]

title: CISA warns of actively exploited Windows, Sophos, and Oracle bugs
description: The U.S. Cybersecurity & Infrastructure Security Agency has added to its catalog of known exploited vulnerabilities (KEV) three security issues that affect Microsoft devices, a Sophos product, and an enterprise solution from Oracle. [...]

title: British Library: Ongoing outage caused by ransomware attack
description: The British Library confirmed that a ransomware attack is behind a major outage that is still affecting services across several locations. [...]
